name: lokale_Daten_Sharepoint_Shortages
description:
Dateien von Sharepoint
z.B. Shortages ( Zuständigkeit: Christoph Carsten)
https://cohrinc.sharepoint.com/sites/o365_group_delbc-anti_corona-SupplyChain

section Section1;
shared Shortages_Paladin = let
  Source = SharePoint.Files("https://cohrinc.sharepoint.com/sites/o365_group_delbc-anti_corona-SupplyChain", [ApiVersion = 15]),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each [Name] = "aktuell_kritische_shortages.xlsx"),

in

  Source = SharePoint.Files("https://cohrinc.sharepoint.com/sites/o365_group_delbc-anti_corona-SupplyChain", [ApiVersion = 15]),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each [Name] = "aktuell_kritische_shortages.xlsx"),
  #"Filtered hidden files" = Table.SelectRows(#"Filtered rows", each [Attributes]?[Hidden]? <> true),
  Navigation = #"Filtered hidden files"{0}[Content]
in
  Navigation;
shared Parameter1141 = let
  Parameter = #"Sample file1141" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type binary]
in
  Parameter;
shared #"Transform file1141" = let
  Source = (Parameter as binary) => let
  Source = Excel.Workbook(Parameter, null, true),
  Navigation = Source{[Item = "Avia LX", Kind = "Sheet"]}[Data],
  #"Promoted headers" = Table.PromoteHeaders(Navigation, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Promoted headers", {{"Fälligkeit", type date}, {"Item", type text}, {"Description", type text}, {"Supplier", type any}, {"Wer ", type text}, {"Zeitraum", type any}, {"Bemerkungen / aktueller Stand", type text}, {"abgeschlossen am", type date}, {"Bereich", type text}})
in
  #"Changed column type"
in
  Source;
shared Shortages_AviaLX = let
  Source = SharePoint.Files("https://cohrinc.sharepoint.com/sites/o365_group_delbc-anti_corona-SupplyChain", [ApiVersion = 15]),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each [Name] = "aktuell_kritische_shortages.xlsx"),
  #"Filtered hidden files" = Table.SelectRows(#"Filtered rows", each [Attributes]?[Hidden]? <> true),
  #"Invoke custom function" = Table.AddColumn(#"Filtered hidden files", "Transform file", each #"Transform file1141"([Content])),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Invoke custom function", {{"Name", "Source.Name"}}),
  #"Removed other columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Renamed columns", {"Source.Name", "Transform file"}),
  #"Expanded table column" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Removed other columns", "Transform file", Table.ColumnNames(#"Transform file1141"(#"Sample file1141"))),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Expanded table column", {{"Source.Name", type text}, {"Fälligkeit", type date}, {"Item", type text}, {"Description", type text}, {"Supplier", type any}, {"Wer ", type text}, {"Zeitraum", type any}, {"Bemerkungen / aktueller Stand", type text}, {"abgeschlossen am", type date}, {"Bereich", type text}}),
  #"Transform columns" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Changed column type", {{"Supplier", type text}, {"Zeitraum", type text}}),
  #"Replace errors" = Table.ReplaceErrorValues(#"Transform columns", {{"Supplier", null}, {"Zeitraum", null}}),
  #"Filtered rows -Faelligkeit" = Table.SelectRows(#"Replace errors", each [Fälligkeit] > #date(2001, 1, 1)),
  #"Renamed columns 1" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Filtered rows -Faelligkeit", {{"Wer ", "Wer"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns 1";
